name: Drop the Square (Emanuele Feronato)
description:
Hyper Casual one button game.

Tap and hold to make the square grow. Release to let it fall.

Perform a perfect landing.

------------------------------------------------------
TECH SPECS
------------------------------------------------------

Framework: Phaser 3.52.0

Physics engine: none

Lines of code: 335

------------------------------------------------------

Available for licensing or with completely explained source code. Learn to build your own game: www.emanueleferonato.com
